Description: Ina Garten: Barefoot Contessa Back to Basics
Directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.
Defrost shrimp by putting in cold water, then drain and toss with oil, salt, and pepper.
Place in oven-safe dish and allow to sit at room temperature while you make the butter and garlic mixture.
Title: Baked Shrimp Scampi
